Package PresentationLayer

Class Printer

java.lang.Object
PresentationLayer.Printer
public class Printer
extends java.lang.Object
Class that contains methods for generating pdf files.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Printer()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void printAll​(java.util.List<?> objectsToPrint)
    Generic method to generate a pdf file in tabular form for an Object(the Object can be a Person or a Product.
    void printAllOrders​(java.util.List<Orders> orders)
    Method used to print for each Orders in the list given through the orders parameter, the name, the product, the quantity and the total price to pay in a pdf file in a tabular form.
    void printOrders​(Person person)
    It generates a pdf file with the Order of a person.
    void printUnderStock​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String product, java.lang.Integer quantity)
    Generates a pdf file to inform the Person with the name given by the parameter that there is an Understock.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Printer

      public Printer()

  • Method Details

    • printOrders

      public void printOrders​(Person person)
      It generates a pdf file with the Order of a person. The pdf file's name will be "Receipt" + Person's name + ".pdf" The pdf will contain every order of that person and the total Price that he has to pay.
      Parameters:
      person - the person

    • printUnderStock

      public void printUnderStock​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String product, java.lang.Integer quantity)
      Generates a pdf file to inform the Person with the name given by the parameter that there is an Understock.
      Parameters:
      name - the name
      product - the product
      quantity - the quantity

    • printAll

      public void printAll​(java.util.List<?> objectsToPrint)
      Generic method to generate a pdf file in tabular form for an Object(the Object can be a Person or a Product. The pdf file name has the following form: the Object's class name + timeStamp + ".pdf"
      Parameters:
      objectsToPrint - the objects to print

    • printAllOrders

      public void printAllOrders​(java.util.List<Orders> orders)
      Method used to print for each Orders in the list given through the orders parameter, the name, the product, the quantity and the total price to pay in a pdf file in a tabular form. The pdf file name has the following form: "Orders" + timeStamp + ".pdf"
      Parameters:
      orders - the orders
